text: Doctors, social workers are very patient, professional and caring. However the whole setting can be stained by rude and impatient counter staff Jeanne Ng. It's not the first time having encountered her rudeness. No sign of hospitality and making parents put off by her impatient and uncaring attitude. Especially when parents has to handle their children. Pls do understand the reason we are there. Hope management has the time to detect such gaps in ther system.
Very bad experience with the reception. The people at reception doesnt know how to handle the appointments at all. They messed up and tell lie to settle
Very caring staff. Attentive to needs of child and also parents.
